markdown:
<title level="1" right="Trait">[Skill](/Traits.aspx?ID=144)</title>

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 636 <sup>4.0</sup></row>

A [general](/Traits.aspx?ID=78) feat with the skill trait improves your skills and their actions or gives you new actions for a skill. A feat with this trait can be selected when a class grants a skill feat or general feat. Archetype feats with the skill trait can be selected in place of a skill feat if you have that archetype's dedication feat.
name: Skill
